<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 6"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Nightwave Springing Reload](/Feats.aspx?ID=4128) <actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Gunslinger" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=406" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Firebrands](/Sources.aspx?ID=196) pg. 77</row>

**Access**
Members of the Firebrands at the rank of second mark or higher have access to this feat.

</column>

---

Training with the crew of the Nightwave has taught you their technique for reloading while leaping to board another ship. You [Leap](/Actions.aspx?ID=81) and then Interact to reload, or Interact to reload and then Leap. You can perform this ability as a 2-action activity to use your Leap to [High Jump](/Actions.aspx?ID=36) or [Long Jump](/Actions.aspx?ID=37) without needing to Stride at least 10 feet first.
